Class RoadMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • RoadMap

  • class RoadMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the road map and the analysis operations.

      • findFastestRoute

        private java.util.List<Road> findFastestRoute(java.lang.String start,
                                              java.lang.String end,
                                              java.util.List<Road> roads)
        Finds the fastest route from the start point to the end point using Dijkstra's algorithm.
        Parameters:
        start - the start point.
        end - the end point.
        roads - the list of roads.
        Returns:
        the list of roads representing the fastest route.
